name: Appointment Scheduling & Reminders
description: Automate appointment booking, confirmations, and reminder sequences for service businesses

parameters.title: ={{$json["service"]}} - {{$json["customerName"]}}

parameters.subject: Appointment Confirmed: {{$json["service"]}} - {{DateTime.fromISO($json["appointmentDate"]).toFormat('MMM dd, yyyy')}}
Reminder: Your appointment tomorrow - {{$json["service"]}}
parameters.message:
Dear {{$json["customerName"]}},

This is a friendly reminder about your appointment tomorrow.

**Appointment Details:**
- Service: {{$json["service"]}}
- Date: {{DateTime.fromISO($json["appointmentDate"]).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy')}}
- Time: {{DateTime.fromISO($json["appointmentDate"]).toFormat('h:mm a')}}
- Duration: {{$json["duration"]}} minutes
- Location: {{$json["location"]}}
- Provider: {{$json["provider"]}}

**Reminders:**
- Please arrive 10 minutes early
- Bring a valid ID
- If you need to cancel or reschedule, please contact us ASAP

**Need to make changes?**
Call us: [Your Phone]
Email us: [Your Email]

We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!

Best regards,
[Your Business Name]

Hi {{$json["customerName"]}}, this is a final reminder about your {{$json["service"]}} appointment in 2 hours at {{DateTime.fromISO($json["appointmentDate"]).toFormat('h:mm a')}}. Please confirm by replying YES or call us if you need to reschedule. Thank you! - [Your Business]
